summary: A documentary looking at the inner-workings of the Church of Scientology.
cast: Paul Haggis|Jason Beghe|Spanky Taylor|David Miscavige|John Travolta|Tom Cruise|Lawrence Wright|L. Ron Hubbard|Marjorie Cameron|Mike Rinder|Tony Ortega|Antony A. Phillips|Hana Whitfield|Kim Masters|Sara Goldberg|Steve Pfauth|Tom De Vocht|Marty Rathbun|Fred Goldberg|Tommy Davis|Jeff Dubron|Nazanin Boniadi|Anderson Cooper|Catherine Bernardini|Anne Joasem|Jenny Linson|John Sweeney|Mosey Rathbun|Ricardo G. Cedillo|Sherry Stringfield|Marina Zenovich|Alex Gibney|Dennis Erlich|Larry King|Barbara Walters|Alex Witherow
title: Going Clear: Scientology & the Prison of Belief
